37.eng-name: The Book of Clothes and Adornment

hadiths.text: Anas b. Malik reported to them (his companions) that Allah's Messnger (ﷺ) had granted concession to Abd al-Rahman b. *Anf and Zubair b. 'Awwam for the wearing of a silk shirt during the journey and because of itch which they both had or any other disease from which both of them had been suffering

chapter.ara-name: باب إِبَاحَةِ لُبْسِ الْحَرِيرِ لِلرَّجُلِ إِذَا كَانَ بِهِ حِكَّةٌ أَوْ نَحْوُهَا
chapter.eng-name: The Permissibility Of Wearing Silk For Men, If A Man Has A Skin Disease Or Similar Problem
